Sustainability.body: Hydro focuses on sustainability in aluminum production by reducing carbon emissions and promoting social balance. The company is working towards a circular economy, where recycling aluminum can reduce the carbon footprint by up to 30 times compared to the industry average. Since 1990, Hydro has halved its carbon emissions and plans to reduce them by 30% by 2030 through emission-free smelting technology. They also prioritize creating jobs and supporting local communities, while investing in research and innovation to minimize environmental impact. Hydro strives to switch to renewable energy sources and use cutting-edge technology to ensure a nature-positive and socially just development
